title: Uncomfortable
body: When I entered the game, my PING suddenly reached 500, I became unable to move. I tried to log in again, which probably took me 3 minutes to reload the game when it was told that my game was over and i was judged to be AFK and needed me to wait 20 minutes. Feeling very irritable.

replies.body: It seems that the game ended with a surrender vote, which resulted in that [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  Your case does sound irritating, and possibly a degrading connection causing packet loss and delay.  I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to speed things up, and test it in a custom game to prevent anymore penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions about this.
